Flow.description: Populates product type based on material class and serial number profile

value.stringValue: AND( OR([Product2].GFSL_FC_Hierarchy__c = 'Calibrated Tool', [Product2].GFSL_FC_Hierarchy__c= 'Non-Calibrated Tool', [Product2].GFSL_FC_Hierarchy__c= 'Reference Tool') , OR(ISNEW(), ISCHANGED([Product2].GFSL_FC_Hierarchy__c ), ISCHANGED([Product2].Service_Product_Type__c )) )

Flow.label: Product : Populate Product Type
